title: Starsight - Volume II
description: STARSIGHT VOL. II - BOOKS III & IV War ravishes the Imperium, held together by the valor of ancient warriors and the devotion of the empires elite. Trenara no longer trusts the power that has turned the boy she once loved into a man she no longer understands. He frightens her. Joshans ascendancy grows every day as he leads them to Sirdars domain. The monster has prepared a welcome that none of them expects and Joshan knows he is endangering them all. Sacrifices are made; bonds are broken. The line between good and evil are blurred in the blood of the innocent. Will Joshan use the power to rescue his world or will a new tyrant sit upon Sirdars throne? Second volume in the Starsight Series
author: Minnette Meador
